SEO.title: Custom Kitchens | KOLSS
SEO.description: We design and manufacture modern custom kitchens: high-quality materials, fast timelines, and guaranteed results.

Hero.title: Kitchens designed for your comfort
Hero.subtitle: We create custom kitchens tailored to your space, style, and budget.
Hero.imageAlt: Modern kitchen for the main banner

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Transparent production and installation timelines with no delays.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Materials and fittings from trusted manufacturers.

warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.description: We provide an official warranty and ongoing service support.

CTA.title: Ready to discuss your project?
CTA.subtitle: Leave a request or contact us for a free consultation.

Calculator.title: Calculate the cost of your ideal kitchen
Calculator.subtitle: Get an accurate estimate of your future kitchen in just a few minutes
Calculator.placeholderDescription: The kitchen cost calculator will be implemented here

size.sectionTitle: What size is your kitchen space?
size.sectionDescription: Select the footprint that best matches your kitchen dimensions.

layout.sectionDescription: Pick the layout that reflects how you move and cook every day.

linear.title: Linear
linear.description: One straight run along a single wall

l_shaped.title: L-Shaped
l_shaped.description: Two connected runs at a right angle

island.title: Island
island.description: Open kitchen with a central island

colors.sectionDescription: Choose a finish direction for your fronts and visible surfaces.

natural_wood.title: Natural Wood
natural_wood.description: Warm tones with a natural oak veneer

worktops.sectionDescription: Worktops define durability and visual character. Choose one material.

plumbing.sectionDescription: Select the plumbing package level for sink and tap fixtures.

appliances.sectionDescription: Add any appliances you want included in your estimate.

installation.sectionDescription: Compare installation scope and choose your preferred execution level.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: Delivery and assembly of cabinets only

summary.sectionDescription: Review your selections and proceed to receive a tailored quote.
summary.disclaimer: Final price may vary following a consultant review

UIKit.title: UI Kit / Design System
UIKit.description: Development-only sandbox for validating reusable interface primitives and interaction states.

default.title: Base Kitchen Option
default.description: Unselected state with standard copy and price formatting.

selected.title: Selected Kitchen Option
selected.description: Selected state preview with primary border and ring.

withImage.title: Card with Image
withImage.description: Shows media layout with object-cover behavior and semantic hover styles.

longText.title: Extra Long Card Title for Wrapping Validation Across Multiple Lines in a Responsive Grid
longText.description: This edge-case card intentionally uses a long block of text to verify wrapping behavior, vertical rhythm, and visual stability when content density is significantly higher than standard options.
